description.overview: Drive represents your motivation to take action, pursue goals, and assert yourself in the world.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Mars and Uranus transits to your natal Mars, 1st house (identity and action), and 10th house (ambition and achievement). Mars brings raw drive, initiative, and the will to act. Uranus adds sudden motivation and unconventional approaches. When these planets form supportive aspects, you feel motivated and capable of bold action. Challenging aspects create frustration, blocked drive, or impulsive action that backfires. Mars retrograde reduces drive by 35%, requiring strategic pacing rather than forcing.

primary_planets.mars: Raw drive, initiative, and will to act - the warrior energy
primary_planets.uranus: Sudden bursts of motivation and breakthrough action

key_houses.1: Personal action, self-assertion, how you initiate
key_houses.10: Career ambition, public achievement, drive for success

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum drive impact - intense motivation or aggression
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between action and restraint
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - motivated action comes naturally
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - obstacles to work through with effort
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for productive action

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Action-oriented and motivational - talk about taking initiative, pursuing goals
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize bold action, starting projects, making moves, asserting yourself
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Emphasize rest without guilt, strategic planning, conserving energy
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge blocked drive but redirect frustration into strategy

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Your drive is strong today - this is your window to start that project, make that ask, or take bold action you've been planning.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Motivation is there but requires effort - channel your drive strategically rather than forcing everything at once.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Drive feels blocked today - rest without guilt and use this time for strategic planning rather than forcing action.
